name: Eye see you
description:
A top down shooter where you play a portal repairer. Unfortunately, these gates are very unstable and are throwing at you ennemies caming from other parallel realities. Survive waves of ennemies to repair gates and gain extra weapons from other worlds !

Hope you enjoy our weird eyes game, we had a lot of fun making it !

Done during the Ludum Dare 49, theme was unstable.

Controls : WASD and mouse to shoot. Press F for Fullscreen.
